javadoc: Interface to manage bookmarks on a program.

methods.name: getBookmarkType
methods.comment: Get the bookmark type associated with the specified property name.

return.comment: bookmark type or null if property name is not recognized.

methods.name: getPropertyName
methods.comment: Get the bookmark property name for a specified bookmark type.

return.comment:
property used to store bookmarks or null if a
 null type was specified.

methods.javadoc: Return all the Bookmark types currenly in use.
methods.name: getTypes
methods.comment: Return all the Bookmark types currenly in use.

methods.name: getBookmarkCount
methods.comment: Get number of bookmarks for the specified type

methods.name: removeAllBookmarks
methods.comment:
Remove all bookmarks of the specific type from the program.
 Caller is responsible for the transaction which incorporates this program change.

methods.name: getBookmark
methods.comment: Get a specific bookmark type at the specified address.

return.comment: bookmark or null if not found.

methods.name: getBookmarkAddresses
methods.comment: Get addresses at which bookmarks of the specified type exist.

methods.javadoc: Returns array of bookmark type records
methods.name: getTypeRecords
methods.comment: Returns array of bookmark type records

name: OldBookmarkManager
comment: Interface to manage bookmarks on a program.
